sqlReaderQuery.value: if object_id('dbo.topNtables') is not null drop table dbo.topNtables; select 1 as output;
select top 3 * from dbo.topNtables order by lastmodifiedtime desc

scripts.text: if object_id('dbo.expandrange') is null create table dbo.expandrange(OrderID int, OrderUnits varchar(max)); truncate table dbo.expandrange

text.value:
insert into dbo.PipelineRunStatus 
Values( '@{pipeline().Pipeline}',
'@{pipeline().RunId}',
'@{formatDateTime(pipeline().TriggerTime,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}',
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}',
datediff(minute, '@{variables('PipelineStartTime')}', '@{variables('PipelineEndTime')}'))

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(last_pay_date) as max_date from test.user_source

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from test.user_source 
 where last_pay_date > '@{activity('Extract Last Load Watermark Date').output.firstRow.last_updated_date}'

insert into dbo.folder_file_counts
select '@{item().Name}',
        @{int(activity('Filter1').output.ItemsCount)};

select 1 as output

scriptLines: orders as (order_date as string, order_id as string, invoice_num as string, cust_id as string, store_id as string, system_date as string, order_lines as (prod_id as string, qty as integer, tax as integer, tax_type as string, discount as integer, discount_type as string, currency_code as string)[])[]
